strings.Value: "That's one thing I never expected to see in the middle of the forest: a circus show. Learning a new trade, Tartuccio?"
[Attack] "I grow tired of your tricks. To arms!"

{n}A kobold with unusually purple scales stands a full head above his tribesmen.{/n} "Lisssten to me. A dragon, huge, sssparkling, flew down to me from the sssky — and told me a sssecret! A great relic, that will win the kobolds glory, isss hidden sssomewhere nearby. Enough of thisss pitiful exissstence! Sssearch for it! Sssearch! And bring it to me!" {n}Their leader speaks in the suspiciously familiar voice of the gnome Tartuccio.{/n}
"Dragon! Glory! Dragon!" {n}The voices of the kobolds rise in excitement.{/n} "We know! The mitesss under the old sssycamore! They possesss the magic treasssure! Very ansssient!"

"You! When will I finally be rid of you?!" {n}The purple "kobold" gives a start of surprise, but immediately collects himself.{/n} "Don't lisssten to {mf|him|her}, tribesssmen! This liar comesss to play tricksss on usss! You and you — hold {mf|him|her} back! The ressst of you — follow me!"
"You, sssilly jessster!" {n}The purple "kobold" does not seem surprised by your appearance.{/n} "I knew you would come, and I've prepared an ambushhh for you!"

"Who is there?! How?!" {n}The kobold impostor nearly jumps in the air.{/n} "Here, you fools! I mean — tribesssmen! Don't lisssten to {mf|his|her} liesss! I ssshall bring you to glory, jussst help me find the relic — and ssstop this trickssster!"

"It's ssstill better than being as sssilly and foolish as you." {n}The fake kobold's behavior is suspiciously calm, and in an instant you understand why.{/n} "While you were following my trailsss, I was preparing an ambushhh. To armsss, my tribesssmen! Don't let {mf|him|her} essscape!
{n}The "kobold" gives a start of surprise and almost drops the horse skull from his head.{/n} "No! How did you find me so quickly?! Tribesssmen, protect me! Cover my essscape!"
{n}The purple "kobold" greets you with mockery.{/n} "At lassst you have come! And what is thisss, you asssk? Why, it's an ambushhh!"
